dhp60:2: The term _yojana_ is a unit of distance. Its exact length is uncertain; estimates vary widely, mostly within the range of 8km to 15km.
dhp61:4: _Sahāyatā_ is from _saha_ (together) + _aya_ (go). Therefore _sahāyatā_ literally means “the aspect of going together”. Although usually translateable as “companionship”, in this context a more literal translation seems appropriate.
